trans-unit.source: Calculates the sine of a number.

seg-source.mrk: Calculates the sine of a number.

target.mrk: Calculates the sine of a number.

trans-unit.source: Returns the trigonometric sine of the number.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the trigonometric sine of the number.

target.mrk: Returns the trigonometric sine of the number.

trans-unit.source: Assign a Local constant variable the approximate PI number.

seg-source.mrk: Assign a Local constant variable the approximate PI number.

target.mrk: Assign a Local constant variable the approximate PI number.

trans-unit.source: Assign a Local variable the sine of PI / 4 (equals to Sqrt(2) / 2).

seg-source.mrk: Assign a Local variable the sine of PI / 4 (equals to Sqrt(2) / 2).

target.mrk: Assign a Local variable the sine of PI / 4 (equals to Sqrt(2) / 2).

trans-unit.source: Assign a Local variable the formula to switch from radian to degree (equals to one degree in radian).

seg-source.mrk: Assign a Local variable the formula to switch from radian to degree (equals to one degree in radian).

target.mrk: Assign a Local variable the formula to switch from radian to degree (equals to one degree in radian).

trans-unit.source: Assign a Local variable the sine of 90 degrees (firstly converted to radians).

seg-source.mrk: Assign a Local variable the sine of 90 degrees (firstly converted to radians).

target.mrk: Assign a Local variable the sine of 90 degrees (firstly converted to radians).
